price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߣߴߊ߲ ߛߊ߬ ߘߊ߫ ߞߵߊ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߓߎ߰ߘߌ ߘߌ߫ ߏ߬ ߞߐߛߊߦߌ߲ ߞߊ߫ ߖߊ߲߬ ( ߕߎ߬ߢߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ) ߞߟߋ߫
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
